Comment: Trump, tested and sharpened by the legal wars of his first term, is first and foremost spurring into action a Chief Justice John Roberts-led court that has shown itself to be tediously cautious and, at times, feckless, in resolving core constitutional questions while proving hasty in slowing Trump’s use of executive power. Even corporate media, certainly no friend of the Supreme Court’s conservative majority, have conceded as much.   Shame of Roberts, a mugwump!
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293
